user.currentRole: Harvard MBA & MS Engineering | Investor @ Contrary | Ex-SpaceX - LinkedIn
user.greeting: Always happy to take conversations about career!
user.intro: Experienced GTM and product guy. Currently at Harvard for the MBA & MS Engineering program. Ex-SpaceX, Warp, LinkedIn, Adobe.
user.lookingFor: Continue building product experience at early stage and explore VC more fully post-MBA
